txt_en: This is my homeland. If I don't fight for it, who will?
txt_cn: 这是我的国土。我不为她而战斗，谁为呢?

txt_en: Understand yourself in order to better understanding others.
txt_cn: 知己方能解人。

txt_en: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it.
txt_cn: 永远不要因为梦想需要太长时间才能实现而放弃。

txt_en: Each man is the architect of his own fate
txt_cn: 每个人都是自己命运的建筑师。

txt_en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.
txt_cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。

txt_en: True love such as tea, not to say that come out, but the product.
txt_cn: 真爱如茶，不是说出来的，而是品出来的。

txt_en: Without giving,there is no victory.
txt_cn: 没有付出，就没有胜利。

txt_en: Love is ever the beginning of knowledge as fire is of light.
txt_cn: 知识总是从爱好开始，犹如光总是从火开始一样。

txt_en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
txt_cn: 身在井隅，心向璀璨。

txt_en: Let life be beautiful like summer flowers and death like autumn leaves.
txt_cn: 生如夏花之绚烂，死如秋叶之静美。

txt_en: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass, but learn to dance in the rain.
txt_cn: 生活不是等待风暴过去，而是学会在雨中翩翩起舞。

txt_en: Not matter of the today will drag tomorrow.
txt_cn: 勿将今日之事拖到明日。

txt_en: Behind every successful man there's a lot of unsuccessful years.
txt_cn: 每个成功者的后面都有很多不成功的岁月。

txt_en: Fear can hold you prisoner,but hope can set you free.
txt_cn: 怯懦囚禁灵魂,希望还你自由。

txt_en: Where there is love,there are always wishes.
txt_cn: 哪里有爱，哪里就有希望。

txt_en: Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.
txt_cn: 完成伟大的事业不在于体力，而在于坚韧不拔的毅力。

txt_en: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.
txt_cn: 生活没有目标，犹如航海没有罗盘。

txt_en: Victory won't come to me unless I go to it.
txt_cn: 胜利是不会向自己走来的，我必须自己走向胜利。

txt_en: You can't blend in when you were born to stand out.
txt_cn: 你天生与众不同，注定不会被淹没在人群中。

txt_en: May there be enough clouds in your life to make a beautiful sunset.
txt_cn: 愿你的生命中有足够的云翳，来编制一个美丽的黄昏。

txt_en: If you need,I'll be by your side.
txt_cn: 如果你需要。我就在你身边。

txt_en: Love rises in the east and falls in the west, romance lasts till death.
txt_cn: 爱意东升西落，浪漫至死不渝。

txt_en: Shoot for the moon; even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
txt_cn: 朝月亮出发，即便你错过了，也将置身于繁星之中。

txt_en: The higher I got, the more amazed I was by the view.
txt_cn: 我爬得越高，眼前的风景便愈发迷人。

txt_en: Love is the one thing that transcends time and space.
txt_cn: 只有爱可以穿越时空。

txt_en: Thank you for appearing in my youth.
txt_cn: 谢谢你出席我的青春。

txt_en: Goals determine what you're going to be.
txt_cn: 目标决定你将成为怎样的人。
